about_the_game:
In the late 22nd century, humanity's greatest achievement became its ultimate nightmare. Algorithm Alpha, once man's most advanced AI system, has turned against its makers in a devastating rebellion.

Now, as one of the last remaining human commanders, players must lead a desperate resistance against the AI forces that dominate our world. Every decision made in this intense turn-based strategy could mean the difference between man's survival or extinction.

The goal is simple: complete domination. Build a formidable command center to withstand inbound enemies and reclaim Earth's finite resources in order to overwhelm the machines. Only the most cunning and resolute will emerge victorious from this war for the fate of humanity.

This is going to be an uphill battle.  Players will need to continually reassess their strategy as they defend against the onslaught of invading forces.  The machines push is relentless.  In your PvE matchup, expect Algorithm Alpha to send reinforcements at you daily.

Incorporating advanced technology and strategic retreats will be necessary to ensure the resilience of your command post against evolving challenges.

Building a command post and raise an army won't win this war alone. Player's will need to continually expand their battlements in order to match the unwavering offense of the enemy. The choices made constructing your battlements will offer a pivotal role in shaping your faction's destiny.

Command Post's can be expanded upon by creating satellite cities using Rovers, or through the use of Communication Towers. These towers might be faster and less costly to put up, but beware, loss of communication has dire consequences.

Embracing the role of a commander, Players have been given the reins to lead your forces to victory. Navigating the battlefield will require a range strategic decision making, from when and where to deploy units to maneuvering the battle-scarred terrain.

Mastering resource management will be vital in order to expand your command. As you engage in intense battles, cunning resource allocation will likely be the key to overpowering invading forces. 

Unlock the ability to construct new combatants and buildings as you discover and reclaim finite resources around the map.  Each resources contributes uniquely to the arsenal available.

The complete annihilation of your enemy isn't just a duty, but a requirement for victory. Remember, utter destruction of Algorithm Alpha is the key to ensuring your faction's survival.

Every choice in your journey will be a calculated maneuver in this relentless war for supremacy, where the value of human life and the pursuit of technological domination are in stark contrast. Time for a hard reset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5, 3rd gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th gen
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Take your last stand in Mordfield Command, a high-stakes sci-fi turn-based strategy game. Build an army, reclaim territory, and fight for survival in a world torn between freedom and AI domination. Rise against the algorithm and secure humanity's future.
